column1: # The MP2722 has a one-time-programming (OTP) function to configure the default values for certain registers. The OTP map below shows the OTP-configurable commands.

column2: 1: D+/D- detection automatically starts after VIN_GD = 1 and the hold-off timer ends
00: CC1 and CC2 are configured automatically
0: The BATT_LOW comparator only generates INT
1: Boost operation stops if over-temperature protection occurs
